title: Philippines urges UN to ensure AI will be used for peace
description: THE Philippines has called on the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) to assert its leadership in harnessing artificial intelligence (AI) as a powerful driver of peace and security amid efforts to misuse it.

title: UAE president meets OpenAI CEO to discuss AI collaboration
description: THE president of the United Arab Emirates (UAE), which has been spending billions in its push to become a global player in artificial intelligence (AI), met OpenAI Chief Executive Sam Altman in Abu Dhabi on Saturday, the UAE state news agency reported.

title: Private equity sees profits in power utilities as electric bills rise and Big Tech seeks more energy
description: HARRISBURG, Pennsylvania, Private investment firms that are helping finance America’s artificial intelligence (AI) race and the huge buildout of energy-hungry data centers are getting interested in the local utilities that deliver electricity to regular customers — and the servers that power AI.

title: Going to hell in a handcart pushed by sentient AI: Time to act, or fold by default
description: ‘An Armageddon is coming. Artificial intelligence will turn on us, inadvertently or nonchalantly’
content:

title: How the AI boom could go the same way as the dotcom bubble
description: Nvidia’s $100bn deal with OpenAI, together with doubts about productivity gains from artificial intelligence, have many asking if this is all just another illusion
content:
Nvidia would pay as each gigawatt of the planned 10GW of datacentres is built. These giant server sheds are measured by their energy use. Like many of the details in their “statement of intent”, it is unclear where the energy will come from.

title: Kvardun: Redefining the Future of Blockchain-Enabled Artificial Intelligence
